CatDescriptText: C. J.Shawver, 7612 Bennett Street, Republican, 13th Ward was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 14, 1957, pg. 3 with question: "Who is your Ward Chairman? Does he have any power? Does he exert his power?" Answer reads: "I don't know who the ward chairman is since I've had no opportunity to meet him.  I don't know whether or not he has any power but he should have power.  However, I haven't seen any evidences of the ward chairman exerting power."
TitMainTitle: C. J. Shawver wearing baseball hat pumping gas, with man in foreground and church in background
